entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023
